H0.text: In which US state are the Catskill Mountains. Pennsylvania

H1.text: In which US state are the Catskill Mountains. Vermont

H2.text: In which US state are the Catskill Mountains. New Jersey

H3.text: In which US state are the Catskill Mountains. Ny

A4.text: The Catskill Mountains, also known as the Catskills, are located in southeastern New York.

A5.text: The Catskill Mountains are approximately 100 miles north-northwest of New York City and 40 miles southwest of Albany, starting west of the Hudson River.
